	var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_script_include");
    gr.get(steps('b08c9c77acc002107f444a3010ee292f').first_record);
	
	var api_name = 'new ' + gr.getValue('api_name') +'()';
	var ev = new GlideScopedEvaluator();
	//var si_obj = eval(api_name);
	var si_obj = ev(api_name);
	
	stepResult.setOutputMessage("Successfully instantiated script include: " + si_obj.sayHello());
	
	
})(outputs, steps, stepResult, assertEqual);</value><variable display_value="Test script">989d9e235324220002c6435723dc3484</variable></sys_variable_value><sys_variable_value action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><document>sys_atf_step</document><document_key>211d1877acc002107f444a3010ee29ac</document_key><order>100</order><sys_class_name>sys_variable_value</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-02-05 22:15:06</sys_created_on><sys_id>93cd5cb7acc002107f444a3010ee2972</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-02-05 22:15:06</sys_updated_on><value>3.1</value><variable display_value="Jasmine version">42f2564b73031300440211d8faf6a777</variable></sys_variable_value></record_update>
